title: Skyward Faith
description: Akira Turner is the lead singer of Skyward Souls, a hot new band opening for Empire of Faith. Enjoying her new found fame and success, nothing could prepare Akira when seeing her ex Axel Murke, the lead guitarist of Accursed Sentiments at a club. Unable to resist, one passionate night is all she can give Axel. But what if he wants her back, but this time for good?A free novella to kick off the Faith in Rockstars series.
author: Adeline Frost
